### First, what packages are needed?
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```






### Made-up Data 
```{r}
madeup_data <- tibble(
  name  = factor(c("A", "B", "C", "D", "E", "F", "G", "H")),
  freq =         c(32,  12,  48,  23,  20,  19,  37,  8)
)


madeup_data
madeup_data %>% 
  glimpse() # name is factor ; score is double
```



```{r}
madeup_data %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = freq, 
             y = name)) + 
  geom_point(shape = 15,
             size  = 5) +
  theme_bw() +
  labs(title = "NOT in order")




madeup_data %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = freq, 
             y = fct_reorder(name, freq))) + 
  geom_point(shape = 15,
             size  = 5) +
  theme_bw() +
  labs(title = "in order :D")
```








```{r}
madeup_data1 <- tibble(
  name  = factor(c("A", "A", "A", "A", "A", 
                   "B", "B", "B",
                   "C", "C", "C", "C", "C", "C", "C",
                   "D")))

madeup_data1 %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = name)) + 
  geom_bar() +
  theme_bw() +
  labs(title = "NOT in order")


madeup_data1 %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = fct_infreq(name))) + 
  geom_bar() +
  theme_bw() +
  labs(title = "in order :D")


madeup_data1 %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = name %>% fct_infreq() %>% fct_rev())) +
  geom_bar() +
  theme_bw() +
  labs(title = "in order :D")
```
